text.div:
Structure
LinkIdTextCardinalityTypeFlagsDescription & Constraints
EmCareA.Registration.PQuestionnairehttps://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/Questionnaire/emcarea.registration.p#0.1.0
EmCare.A.DE01National Unique identification0..1string
EmCare.A.DE03null0..*choiceOptions: 1 option
EmCare.A.DE04First Name1..1stringExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE03').answer.first().empty()
EmCare.A.DE05Middle Name0..1stringExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE03').answer.first().empty()
EmCare.A.DE06Last Name1..1stringExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE03').answer.first().empty()
dobDate of Birth0..1dateExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE11').answer.first().empty()
EmCare.A.DE11null0..*choiceOptions: 1 option
Expressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='dob').answer.first().empty()
EmCare.A.DE12Provide an estimated age or estimated date of birth0..1choiceOptions: 3 options
Expressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE11').answer.first().exists()
EmCare.A.DE15.1Estimated Date of Birth0..1dateExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE12').answer.first().value.code = 'EmCare.A.DE15'
EmCare.A.DE14.dAge in days0..1quantityExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE12').answer.first().value.code = 'EmCare.A.DE14'
EmCare.A.DE14.wAge in weeks0..1quantityExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE12').answer.first().value.code = 'EmCare.A.DE14'
EmCare.A.DE13.moAge in months0..1quantityExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE12').answer.first().value.code = 'EmCare.A.DE13'
EmCare.A.DE13.aAge in years0..1quantityExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE12').answer.first().value.code = 'EmCare.A.DE13'
eweeknull0..1quantity
EmCare.A.DE13.2.dEstimated age in days0..1quantityExpressions:
  • Enable When: (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE08').answer.first().exists() or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE12').answer.first().value.code = 'EmCare.A.DE15') and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='eweek').answer.first().value < 4 'weeks'
EmCare.A.DE13.2.moEstimated age in months0..1quantityExpressions:
  • Enable When: (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE08').answer.first().exists() or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE12').answer.first().value.code = 'EmCare.A.DE15') and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='eweek').answer.first().value >= 4 'weeks' and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='eweek').answer.first().value< 104 'weeks'
EmCare.A.DE13.2.aEstimated age in year0..1quantityExpressions:
  • Enable When: (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE08').answer.first().exists() or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE12').answer.first().value.code = 'EmCare.A.DE15') and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='eweek').answer.first().value >= 104 'weeks'
edobCalculated Date of Birth0..1dateExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE12').answer.first().value.code = 'EmCare.A.DE13' or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE12').answer.first().value.code = 'EmCare.A.DE14'
  • Calculated Value: %cdob
EmCare.A.DE08Consolidated Date of Birth0..1dateExpressions:
  • Calculated Value: iif( %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='dob').answer.first().exists(),%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='dob').answer.first().value,iif( %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE15.1').answer.first().exists(),%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE15.1').answer.first().value, %cdob ))
EmCare.A.DE16Sex1..1choiceOptions: 3 options
EmCare.A.DE48Caregiver0..1boolean
newrelatedpersonnull0..*choiceOptions: 1 option
Expressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE48').answer.first().empty() and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE03').answer.first().empty()
relatedpersonuuidnull0..1stringInitial Value: string = uuid()
emcarerelatedpersoncaregiveridnull0..1stringExpressions:
  • Calculated Value: iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='newrelatedperson').answer.first().exists(), %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='relatedpersonuuid').answer.first().value,{})
EmCare.A.DE21.1null0..1groupExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='emcarerelatedpersoncaregiverid').answer.first().exists()
EmCare.A.DE21Caregiver First Name1..1string
EmCare.A.DE22Caregiver Middle Name0..1string
EmCare.A.DE23Caregiver Last Name1..1string
EmCare.A.DE35Primary Caregiver’s Mobile telephone number0..1integer
relatedpersonidnull0..1stringExpressions:
  • Calculated Value: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='newrelatedperson').answer.first().exists()
EmCare.A.DE24Caregiver’s Relationship to Client1..1choiceOptions: 6 options
Expressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE48').answer.first().empty()
EmCare.A.DE31Biological Mother Vital Status1..1choiceDefinition: https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes
Options: 3 options
Expressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE21.1').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE24').answer.first().value.code != 'EmCare.A.DE25'
EmCare.A.DE31-helpThe client’s mother and/or father’s vital status.0..1display
EmCare.A.DE32Biological Father Vital Status1..1choiceDefinition: https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes
Options: 3 options
Expressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE21.1').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE24').answer.first().value.code != 'EmCare.A.DE26'
EmCare.A.DE32-helpThe client’s mother and/or father’s vital status.0..1display
EmCare.A.DE38null0..*choiceOptions: 1 option
Expressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='emcarerelatedpersoncaregiverid').answer.first().value.code = 'newCaregiver' or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE48').answer.first().exists()
timestampnull0..1dateTimeExpressions:
  • Calculated Value: now()

Documentation for this format

Option Sets

Answer options for EmCare.A.DE03

  • null#EmCare.A.DE03 ("Child's Identity unknown/prefer to remain anonymous")

Answer options for EmCare.A.DE11

  • null#EmCare.A.DE11 ("Date of Birth not known")

Answer options for EmCare.A.DE12

  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.A.DE13 ("Estimated age in years/months for child (2 months or older)")
  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.A.DE14 ("Estimated age in weeks/days for young infant (under 2 months old)")
  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.A.DE15 ("Estimated Date of Birth")

Answer options for EmCare.A.DE16

  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.A.DE17 ("Female")
  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.A.DE18 ("Male")
  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.A.DE19 ("Not Specified")

Answer options for newrelatedperson

  • null#newrelatedperson ("Register a new Caregiver")

Answer options for EmCare.A.DE24

  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.A.DE25 ("Mother")
  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.A.DE26 ("Father")
  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.A.DE27 ("Sibling")
  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.A.DE28 ("Extended family")
  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.A.DE29 ("Legal Guardian")
  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.A.DE30 ("Not Related")

Answer options for EmCare.A.DE31

  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.A.DE46 ("Dead")
  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.A.DE34 ("Alive")
  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.A.DE33 ("Unknown")

Answer options for EmCare.A.DE32

  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.A.DE46 ("Dead")
  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.A.DE34 ("Alive")
  • https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes#EmCare.A.DE33 ("Unknown")

Answer options for EmCare.A.DE38

  • null#EmCare.A.DE38 ("Caregiver wants to receive SMS or other messages regarding the child's visits and health status")

valueCoding.display: Child's Identity unknown/prefer to remain anonymous

item.text: Provide an estimated age or estimated date of birth

valueCoding.display: Estimated age in years/months for child (2 months or older)
Estimated age in weeks/days for young infant (under 2 months old)

item.text: The client’s mother and/or father’s vital status.
The client’s mother and/or father’s vital status.

valueCoding.display: Caregiver wants to receive SMS or other messages regarding the child's visits and health status
